lenders.occupational_info: I started Uni this year as a mature age student going back to get my first degree.  Its fantastic!  I should have come long ago.  i am having so much fun, despite all the hard work.

lenders.loan_because: I receive a great deal of satisfaction from helping people improve their lives.  I believe many of these people just need a helping  hand to get things rolling .
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self employed food distributor in San Francisco and I can appreciate how difficult it is to get a business up and running.

lenders.name: Carmen & Norman
lenders.loan_because: I know what its like to see people struggle in third world countries. I see the lack of job opportunities and how discriminative employers can be especially towards age.  Norman inspires me to give to those less fortunate.  Being an immigrant in this country and making less than $8/hour, he sponsored a child through Children International.  I aspire to be like him, not so selfish.   Even though I have large student loans and other financial obligations, I'm committed to lending and helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Hiking Machu Picchu in 2005 was a life changing experience for me.  Because I am fluent in Spanish, I was able to communicate with the guide and porters.  I saw how proud they were to earn enough money to send their kids to school.  It was a rewarding experience and an eye opener...

lenders.name: Geralde & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: we are among the privileged of the world and we don't need to worry about where the next meal will come from. lenders.occupational_info: I wouldn't want to try.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to help someone who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with addicts and their families to help them make positive changes in their lives.

lenders.name: Jerome
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance helps reconnect the human spirit.  Sustainable economies are the key to a more peaceful world.  Responsible economic growth through microfinance provides a foundation for solving many problems which cannot be solved through large donations or Government funding.  One example is where the local farmer was put out of business when the large trucks filled with donated food showed up (creating an economic imbalance) and when the donated food was gone, the village once again suffered due to the lack of a local food source and a sustainable local economy.  Of course this is a complicated issue as communities need both emergency aid and a sustainable local economy.  By helping provide a stable local economy through responsible microfinance, we can help limit the severity on future emergencies and enable people to realize good and productive lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people and finances for a living.  Helping others helps me too!  It is very enriching.  We are in this together.

lenders.name: helen
lenders.loan_because: it's right in every way. I don't have to have millions to do some good. I don't have to give to an agency and just hope for the best. When the loan is repaid, someone else can get some help. I can tell my students about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students who fell behind in their High School work so badly that they might be drop-outs except for our program. We are very successful. I teach Social Studies, English, Science, Art,& Parenting.

The Company is over 35 years old and we specialize in developing and selling small audio and video distribution and security products that are sought after world-wide due to our reputation for quality.

lenders.name: Stephen Postlethwaite
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to design computer games.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help give people opportunites they might not otherwise have.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: Because even a little bit can help.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I'm just doing my small part.  Hard working people around the world should have the same chance for happy life as I do.  I can't help but imagine myself in their shoes.
lenders.occupational_info: I study economics at the University of British Columbia.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: we are all ONE.

lenders.name: Vikash
lenders.loan_because: the idea of helping individuals around the world create a business to help feed their families, support their own economy and assist individuals who want to be proactive is something that anyone can become passionate about.
lenders.occupational_info: I help with projects, processes and management for a company that makes it possible for individuals to buy homes

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I think it is really cool to be able to help someone who is less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I lease office space to companies in Ridgeland, Mississippi.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: We all need good Karma.
lenders.occupational_info: Textbook publishing.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because:
I can and someone out there will use the money in the correct way.
Semper Fi !

lenders.name: Meg
lenders.loan_because: I have a an independent editing business and know how arduous it can be to make it profitable. If I can be of some help to another business owner, it makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: Editing for all your business, academic, and nonfiction needs.

lenders.name: Andi
lenders.loan_because: "We need to be the change we wish to see in the world."

lenders.name: Dan & Diansa
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful concept. The idea of knowing your money directly helps someone makes it all very personal.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in sales.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It gives people an opportunity to help themselves and help communities.

lenders.name: Eleanor
lenders.loan_because: ...because I've got a little bit to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with authors to write textbooks for college and university level courses.

lenders.name: Juddie, remembering Dad
lenders.loan_because: I know it makes a difference to peoples' lives
lenders.occupational_info:
Wooden-boat builder, furniture maker and odd-job man, very busy in my retirement.

** Note from Dick's daughter, Juddie **    
My father passed away in February 2009. We have established a memorial team in his name, and will transfer his Kiva loans and reinvest his contributions as part of the Dick Adamson Memorial Fund when we can.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like being poor, I know what it's like living pay check to pay check. I've never been rich and may never be. But, as long as I can help someone else, I will do what I can.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others

lenders.name: Marla
lenders.loan_because: I couldn't not.

lenders.name: Dick
lenders.loan_because: As you have done for the least of these, you have done for me.

lenders.name: Oliver & Angela
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people who work hard. We're also excited to see our investments well used!
lenders.occupational_info:
Oliver is an Enterprise Architect and he designs computer and telephone networks. 

Angela is an Information and Knowledge Manager and she classifies and organizes information. Information and knowledge management help people and organizations understand what information they own so that it can be used more competitively.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to live in a wealthy country and wealthy area of that country.  This is an important way to support our human relatives around the world for whom access to capital is difficult.  Our lending can make a real difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: i have a little extra money and I want to show God's love in a practical way
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee the operations of a summer camp for children

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in the lives of my sisters and brothers around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others see and share the beauty of creation.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with family and friends
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people that are sick

lenders.name: Todd
lenders.loan_because: Free trade, commerce and ownership rights help drive the most efficient allocation of resources known to man
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Sales for a 100 year old company that makes Bleach and other consumer goods.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a professor of Mathematics. In the meantime, I help teach basic math classes.

lenders.name: Alex and Sydney
lenders.occupational_info: provide medical care

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Everyone needs a little help occasionally.

lenders.name: Carey
lenders.loan_because: those who ask should receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I am stationed near the DMZ, helping defend the South Korean people.

lenders.name: bahareh
lenders.loan_because: I find this to be one of the best ways to help people become self sufficient and for me to invest money in a local community that desperately needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: Working on Juris Doctorate

lenders.name: Bhalchander Vishwanath
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help entrepreneurs create jobs and help society.
lenders.occupational_info: Check out : http://www.unitedprosperity.org

lenders.name: Shirley J
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up, and not a hand out.  All hard working people deserve a chance.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I've heard this is a good way to help people support themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a musician. I conduct a church choir and play French horn in a community band. I write music for both. 

I'm also the Director of a Center for the Arts at our church, where we provide education, support and opportunities for sharing to musicians and visual artists.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I build apartment buildings

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I want to know that I'm helping other people, and this way I can do it on an individual basis, put a face to a name, and see the results.

lenders.name: Shari
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Pepper
lenders.loan_because: Everyone is responsible for everyone else.  This seems like a great way to sidestep government aid, and lend my money my way to the people I choose to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I play in a political punk band here in Los Angeles called Bobot Adrenaline

lenders.name: Jim & Lori Jacobson
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Jim is a Christian Pastor, and Lori is a homemaker and mother. We love Jesus.

lenders.name: The Wasiak Foundation
lenders.loan_because: To help the women of the world fight the social inequities of the past.
lenders.occupational_info: I look after computer systems.

lenders.name: Debashis
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people become self-sufficient.  It's the least I can do. :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of people working on next generation design software.

lenders.name: Andrea & Brad
lenders.occupation: Andrea - School Teacher; Brad - Retired Firefighter
lenders.loan_because: It is a nice way to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: We live near the Skagit River and enjoy beekeeping, hiking, birding, sea kayaking, and walking with our Beagles -  Harley & Junebug.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I've been very fortunate, and want to help someone else if I can.

lenders.name: Tori
lenders.loan_because: By small and simple things are great things brought to pass.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams, as others have helped me.

lenders.name: J S
lenders.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and he eats for one day; teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime."  A hand up is better than a hand out.

lenders.name: Migle
lenders.loan_because: It takes little to change someone's life...

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.occupation: Photographer at the happiest place on Earth
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to improve their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: Originally hailing from Napa, CA, I now live and work in Orlando at the happiest place on Earth! I have a passion for traveling and photography. I lean towards livestock loans because of the many different ways an animal can contribute towards a family (Sales, consumption, fertilizer, breeding). I also enjoy loans for craftswomen.

lenders.name: J.MARUTHU
lenders.loan_because: for education MBA

lenders.name: Jane B
lenders.loan_because:
Personally I think helping others & sharing is part of being a world citizen, as well as a privilege.  Professionally, my company regularly donates, and puts a percentage of gross income to help small businesses and groups in other countries.  
As a businesswoman, I choose to support other women.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with business owners and managers to improve their businesses and help them towards better systems of management.

lenders.name: Darrell
lenders.loan_because: someone helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Air traffic controller

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I and my daughter produce books that explore the human experience.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I like investing in mankind.
lenders.occupational_info: I help find efficient ways to manage businesses.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
There is enough for everyone if we can learn to share.

& because I have benefited from a history that has not been as kind to others.

& because people have helped me when I needed help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a priest in the Episcopal Church (which is part of the Anglican Communion).

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It's incredible that what is pocket change to me can help fund someone else's dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Currenly exploring new career opportunities; I have been an Executive Assistant for years and have never been happy with it.  I hope to find something that will allow me to use my creativity, be independent, and happier; just not sure yet what that will be.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much, and I want to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a computer-run printer for a large printing company.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I realise how much we have in the culture that we live in and I want to help those who don't have as much opportunity as we do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am running a home for children.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it's great to help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to share what I can with others throughout the world, and do something concrete to help them to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is psychotherapy for individuals and couples.  I'm trained to help people discover their own inner resources to resolve their problems.  I've done this work for over 30 years, and still love it.

lenders.name: SCOTT
lenders.loan_because: It gives me the chance to help someone else become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell contracts that  in the event of a fire/theft or accident you will get money to start your business over again.

lenders.name: Maura
lenders.loan_because: To be able to help people with whatever resources I have at my disposal.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to meet great people and help motivate and program their health and fitness goals.

lenders.name: Nida
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help my family by putting up my own business

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in what Vice President Gore's program is doing. It is a small investment which can bring back a large return for the recipient.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work with children between the ages of birth to 21 years old with physical and mental disabilities in the public school setting.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe that access to capital is the largest impediment to many impoverished people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a process-expert for specialty paper-making machinery.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult life can be.... I like to help others whenever possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a COTA (Certified Occupational Therapy Assistant) until a car accident ended my working career.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I live a very blessed life.  I have never had to go without the things I need in life.  I would love to help someone else to live a better life, as well.  I wish them many blessings!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a store.  I help customers, re-stock the shelves with merchandise and run a cash register.

lenders.name: Daryl
lenders.loan_because: "If you help the poor, you are lending to the Lord--and He will repay you!" Proverbs 19:17 NLT
lenders.occupational_info: Spreading the love of Jesus Christ

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: everything belongs to God.

lenders.name: Dan and Cathy
lenders.loan_because: We like helping people willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Dan helps companies write web pages.  Cathy helps companies with managing their financial business.

lenders.name: Ashlee
lenders.loan_because: Because I care and want to help where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the elderly. Offering them a safe and enjoyable place to live when they can no longer live on their own.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  Some choose to fight wars in order to spread freedom.  I loan because giving individuals opportunity is how  freedom is truly spread.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room and give medical care.

lenders.name: KIM AND PAUL
lenders.loan_because: WE FEEL LIKE WE ARE INVESTING IN THE WORLD.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't because I have an irregular heartbeat.

lenders.name: jim
lenders.loan_because:
If they do better there...they won't come here.
If they get enough capitalism.... I won't have to go there and "work."
lenders.occupational_info: Airborne combat support.

lenders.name: Radosveta
lenders.loan_because: I believe people have good hearts; if given a chance anyone can change their life; want to end world poverty

lenders.name: Ginelle
lenders.loan_because: Just a little bit of my money can make a huge difference to someone else.  It gives me perspective when I start to feel sorry for myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I became a nurse so that I can help sick people to get better and to keep healthy people healthy.

lenders.name: Nancy & Scott
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish...

lenders.name: Maria Z.
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with many things in my life (a loving family, a college education, financial stability, and personal security). I was born in country with extreme poverty (Ecuador) but moved to the United States at a young age. My experiences have helped me realize how lucky I truly am and, in turn, inspires me to help others pull themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.occupation: Systems Engineer and one cool mofo!!

lenders.name: babs
lenders.loan_because: After a trip to West Africa this year I was so happy to learn about Kiva. With great pleasure I am able to give the women of Africa a helping hand to start a business.  It is vital that we help others in the world!!!

lenders.name: Debbie and Mike
lenders.loan_because: We care because we believe in the inexhaustible capacity of human capital.  We give because we can.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I have a small business myself, and I want to empower others, especially women, to improve their lives through micro-enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software for small to medium manufacturing companies.

lenders.name: Jamey
lenders.loan_because: Why not help, if you can?
lenders.occupational_info: I help people by massaging their backs, necks, shoulders and legs. I especially enjoy working with pregnant women.

lenders.name: Marten
lenders.loan_because: This website really makes the world a smaller place. It's an amazing feeling I can help someone in a developing country this easily. We have so much to give and these people can do so much with our help. I am proud of all the entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a webeditor.

lenders.name: Norman
lenders.loan_because: People need help and I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: Jet pilot

lenders.name: Julia and Joanne
lenders.loan_because: Joanne and I want to help women make their lives and their children's lives better. We are excited and proud of the successes achieved by the hard working women who get loans through Kiva, and we are glad to do our little part to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I write documentation about XBRL business reporting software and develop Java code; Joanne is an honor-roll student in 7th grade.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to make a difference. As an artist I hope to target my loans to businesses that support artisans.
lenders.occupational_info: I am artist (water-color, digital) and I design websites. I also work for an amazing non-profit, Bridges to Understanding,  that connects youth worldwide through storytelling and problem-solving.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: It is a fun way to help out hard working people.
lenders.occupational_info: I design computer software.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a responsible global citizen.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a healer, teacher and I also make jewelry from fair-trade natural gems and recycled silver and gold.

lenders.name: Earl
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to give someone else a chance :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I manage Cost, Scope and Schedule on small to midsized projects (5K to ~2M). I am married and have two young sons. I reside in rural Pennsylvania

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: it makes the world a better place ...  It's the least we can do for those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer and web development expert.

lenders.name: Lucas
lenders.loan_because: By sharing we will find a way

lenders.name: ELAINE
lenders.loan_because: My faith encourages me to reach out  to my fellow brothers and sisters around the world.  I think Kiva is an excellent way to lend a helping hand and a way of continuing the circle of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in a hospital as a social worker for thirteen years and retired three years ago.

lenders.name: Sushil
lenders.loan_because: I like to promote entrepreneurship in locations where normally it would be very difficult to procure capital.
lenders.occupational_info:
I design computer chips for a large technology company.  

I also own my own company where I assist small business in integrating technologies to assist them in being more responsive to growing demands and reducing cost.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Once a bee was drowning in a pond.  I reached out into the pond with a stick and put it in front of the bee so he could climb on.  That's all he needed - a little something solid to put his feet on, and he was able to take off into the sky!  ~Sometimes just a little boost can save someone's life.~
lenders.occupational_info: I promote healthy and happy lifestyles.

lenders.name: Candra
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a barista. i prepare overpriced espresso drinks for funny people.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because:
I like honest people who work hard to improve their lives. 

BECAUSE I am  humbled by your courage to be an entrepreneur, to be a provider of your family, to be model of your community.
lenders.occupational_info: My daily work consists of running a community pharmacy, dispensing drugs, talking with doctors about drug therapy choices, talking with insurance providers to get explanation on coverage for my patients.   I  give health care advices to my patients, especially about drugs. I also do vaccinations, mostly flu shots.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are overlooked by traditional financial institutions.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in a rural area and teach Business courses online

lenders.name: Kimberli
lenders.occupation: Educator....looking for an adjunct professor  posi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a educator

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It is important in this day and age to show kindness to those in need. If we all help one another we will spread goodness throughout the earth and create peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness and advocate for those who can not advocate for themselves.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: Those fortunate enough to be born in first world countries should extend their wealth to help out their fellow human beings
lenders.occupational_info: I design video games for kids 8-16

lenders.name: Vincent Coppola
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to improve the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Investment banking, mergers and acquisitions

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe everybody deserves a break.

lenders.name: Mikael
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Abby and Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can. We can make a small difference and that adds up. We loan because we need to bridge the gap between multi-national banks and the needs of the individual entrepreneur who is making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bank and my husband works in an advertising agency.

lenders.name: The White Family
lenders.loan_because: We Are All One.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Every donation, no matter how small, helps someone out there who needs it.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-credit over hand-outs in building sustainable initiatives.  I have been a volunteer in international development in Africa and South-Asia for many years and saw a lot of money wasted through governments and intermediaries.  I want very much to see this creative approach to direct support work out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help resolve disputes between banks and their customers that they have been unable to resolve themselves.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician / actor.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is a simple way to make a real difference in people's lives.

lenders.name: Juliana and Ted
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place for everyone.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to break down the definition of "neighbor" to go beyond street, cunty, state or country.

lenders.name: Frankie
lenders.loan_because: I think micro loans are so much smarter than almost any "giving" I can do. Instead of a bag of grain that last a couple days, they have a livelihood, a goal and an opportunity to see capitalism at work. In addition, it gives a person great dignity and a sense of self worth to repay loan from money they have made!
lenders.occupational_info: I educate children in reading, writing, social studies and math.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.occupational_info: I support all kinds of people as they work on making healthy choices to enhance their quality of life.

lenders.name: Martins
lenders.loan_because: I love that people can connect across the world to help each other!  This is such a fantastic experience to be a part of helping another person becoming economically sustainable and not depend on high interest loans, which become a form of financial slavery.  My husband owns his own business and owes no one a dime!  It's an empowering position to be at cause rather than at effect in life.  :)
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school English.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: it's a lot more satisfying to know that you helped some people try to get out of poverty than to get a measly 5% interest in savings on a couple bucks

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurism and small business are the keys to economic development, particularly in rural areas.
lenders.occupational_info: I find money to support the programs in my non-profit agency that help the poor living in rural areas.

lenders.name: jill
lenders.loan_because: i can!
lenders.occupational_info: I cut patterns and work with a team of sewers to fit costumes to actresses and actors in a local theatre.

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Good question.

lenders.name: Jeannine
lenders.loan_because: I have been traveling thru Africa and this country, her people, and the cultures have captured my heart.  I want to contribute to the success of those people in Africa who are doing so much to increase their families lives and the education of their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate broker working in residential real estate.  I have been an entrepreneur all my business career and realize the dedication and belief it takes to make your business successful.  I believe in giving forward to those people who are also taking risks and challenges.

lenders.name: Lin
lenders.occupation: Face Reader - Trainer- Jury consultant - Business
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering a person to succeed in their dreams..  I recently read Bill Clinton's book " Giving" and was drawn to the opportunity to give back through "Kiva"
lenders.occupational_info: For the last 15 years I have been presenting Face Reading workshops and seminars as a certified Face Reader. Giving people a tool to understand each other at a new level and see them self through new eyes. This is my way of improving the world ----One Face At A Time!

lenders.name: Sherri & Ty
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this together.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I should.

lenders.name: Steve J.
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled enough to know how incredibly fortunate I am.
lenders.occupational_info: Coordinator, International Programs at the University of Hawaii-Leeward Community College.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Justin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.

lenders.name: Suzanne E
lenders.loan_because: i want to help, no matter how small, the people in Africa who have such big hearts and were so kind to us when we visited several years ago.
lenders.occupational_info: i am retired, but used to work at a non profit organization teaching people to prevent crime and how to stay safe.  Now, I have a pet photography business with a friend.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women be successful and happy.

lenders.name: Marek
lenders.loan_because: I admire the determination, hard work and courage of the people being in the difficult situation but trying to change it. I just try to help them.

lenders.name: Lyla
lenders.loan_because: it is helping people and it is also generous.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in third grade and  I enjoy playing soccer and Korean dancing.  I also like to ski and run fast.  I want to be a lawyer when I grow up.

lenders.name: Rodney
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be poor (by American standards) and how much a small loan can be a big help.

lenders.name: toni
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be given the opportunity to pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide healthcare to all segments of the population, old and young.  I also teach medicine to new, graduating doctors.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: Many people are deprived of opportunities not because they don't deserve them, but because of where they were born and the situation they were born into.  I want to help these hard-working people reach their dreams.  KIVA grants loans to people so they can work for what they want and feel proud of what they are able to accomplish and that's why I am a part of it.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I'm studying political science at university, and I hope to move forward into a career in law.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I'm interested in helping people, and curious about building cross cultural business relationships.
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture doors, plywood and composite parts. We purchase wood veneers from all over the world to build architectural items for homes and offices.

lenders.name: Greg & Cat
lenders.loan_because: It is a good opportunity.

lenders.name: Common Sense
lenders.loan_because: Giving Back and Being Kind is Common Sense.
lenders.occupational_info: Doing what I can...

lenders.name: Alvaro
lenders.loan_because: I want to get better quality of grass for feeding cows instead of continue cutting trees from forest in order to convert them into grasslands. Better quality per m2, instead of more space. Also preparing a plan for reforestation inconjuction with the community.
lenders.occupational_info: Passionate, Hard, Beautiful

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: "Where much is given, much is required."
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother to 4 children.  I get to help and watch them grow

lenders.name: Rutherford Family
lenders.loan_because: We have everything.  Two cars, grocery stores, safety, water, etc.  I would want someone to help me if I was not so lucky.

lenders.name: Saira and Daniel
lenders.loan_because: We want to encourage the growth and success of friends around the world by supporting their ambitions. The Kiva experience offers a chance to help someone directly and be able to witness the outcome.

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: I like the  micro loan concept. My father helped me fund my first professional job with a micro loan and it  helped me become independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I photograph people and products in studio and on location for advertising use.

lenders.name: Aran
lenders.loan_because: Someone helped me get started. Now it is my turn.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a library in a public middle school and also teach English as a Second Language to refugee students from around the world.

lenders.name: Ron & Loma
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate between small and large business owners and the owners of the land/building they occupy.

lenders.name: Julie Sanders
lenders.loan_because: Through international travel, I have spent time in some of the world's poorest regions.  The lack of resources and infrastructure can be disheartening and frustrating.  I know that so little goes a long way in developing countries and  through micro finance loans we  can help improve lives all over the world.  Thank you Kiva crew for providing the platform.  Amazing work!
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked as an international travel consultant for The National Educational Travel Council and Airtreks.  Currently I am an editor at Night+Day, Cool Cities series by Pulse Guides.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: The better we make the rest of the world, the better our home will be.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep two-way radios, telephones, and other electronic devices working.
